jump_scares.spoiler: Sophia rips the bedroom curtains open while touring the house
Sophia is startled in the parking lot observing a woman and her baby
Joseph angrily throws a tub of water on Sophia to wake her up
While conjuring spirits, Sophia sees a dark shape smoking a cigarette shifting in the char across from her
A demon hand grabs Sophia and forces her into the basement
The girl turns around and a figure in a cape stands behind her
When the girl closes the door, a figure in a cape appears behind her
After Helena comes out of the room, the camera zooms in and the cape-wearing figure appears from the room and grabs her. Very similar to the jump scare in Exorcist 3, but not at all effective
Riley is suddenly grabbed by Professor Gelson as she looks in the window
When the girl turns on the light, a man in a mask is next to her
When Riley says “Oh my” suddenly an arrow flies past her
Kris sneaks through the kitchen. On the table you can already see a man standing with a cape. When he jumps down, a loud noise is heard
Suddenly someone bangs on the car window as Kris stands in front of the house
The phone rings which startles the family at the dinner table
Mrs. Graciella turns around and it is revealed to be Cady in disguise
Cady grabs Sam around the neck
Cady puts a gun to Sam’s head
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
A boy bangs on the car window, startling Carrie
A girl smashing into the window in front of Sue may startle some viewers
Carrie’s mother, who appears to be dead, suddenly gasps
(alternative ending)  As Sue lies on the surgical table after giving birth, a bloodied hand suddenly appears. [Video]
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
A gloved hand suddenly appears as Michèle attempts to close the glass doors
There is an abrupt flashback to the masked man attacking Michèle
A bird flies into a window
Michèle’s cat jumps on her during a tense scene
The masked man appears behind Michèle
A deer jumps in front of Michèle’s car
Michèle turns around and the masked man is standing in front of her
A man grabs Kate from behind in the shower while she fantasizes about her husband
As the elevator door opens Kate comes face to face with a blonde woman wielding a razor
Liz glances up to see a woman watching her with binoculars and quickly get into a taxi

Liz runs frantically through a moving subway car to avoid an angry gang. As she struggles to close a door connecting two trains, a shiny razorblade appears in the window next to her head. She is grabbed and attacked

Liz emerges from the shower horrified to see someone standing just outside the bathroom door. She slowly walks to the medicine cabinet for a straight razor. Closing the mirror, the murderer appears in the reflection behind her, the film jump cuts to empty shoes, and Liz screaming
While kissing Alex, Dan is shocked to discover that Alex has slit her wrists
Dan jumps in the parking garage when the car alarm goes off
Beth screams upon finding Ellen’s rabbit boiling in a pot on the stove
Beth slams into a car while frantically looking for her daughter Ellen
Alex jumps towards Dan with a knife when he threatens to expose her
Dan pulls the tea kettle off the stove and hears Beth screaming
Alex emerges from the tub screaming and wielding a knife
Lucy’s daughter appears in a dream and doesn’t appear to be human
Adrian startles Lucy while she snoops around his office
A snake slithers out of the rabbit cage
A hand reaches out and grabs Chris
The motorcycle gang member gets stabbed by a pitchfork
Chuck suddenly bumps into Debbie
A bag falls from the ceiling
A hanging corpse falls from the tree
A corpse is thrown through the window
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
A loud noise is heard behind him and something briefly flies by the camera
A girl appears laying behind him
The girl turns around to face him
The camera moves to a corpse and the corpse moves its eye
Camera cuts to a dead body
The lights go off and the man sees a dead person appear in front of him
The girl turns the lights off and several dead appear
A hand reaches out from the floor and grabs him

movies.title: Harvested 2 – The Legend of Harold Rice

jump_scares.spoiler: Girl appears in kitchen
Woman sleeping on couch and monster appears
Girl on her phone and monster appears behind her
Killer grabs a victim from behind
Killer stabs victim
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
Jang Kyung-chul breaks the window of the car
Jang Kyung-chul leaps from the left and tackles Jang Se-yun
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
The young woman suddenly growls and bites down at the samurai’s neck
Accompanied by a loud noise, a figure runs behind Lucie
An emaciated arm comes out from underneath the bed
The old emaciated woman on the bed suddenly screams and reaches out for Lucie
A man is shot as he answers the door
A young man is suddenly shot
Lucie sees the old emaciated woman in the kitchen
The old woman jumps on Lucie
Lucie slowly opens the door and is once again attacked by the old woman
Anna looks in the mirror and sees the mother looking at her
The old woman slides out from behind the bathtub
A sudden flashback, accompanied by the loud metallic noise of a door opening may startle some viewers
Lucie appears in the hallway as Anna tries to help the mother to the door
The chain on the floor suddenly moves
Anna shines the torch on a mutilated, chained up woman
A woman is suddenly shot
Ma bangs on the window as the group are about to drive off
Some eggs are thrown at Ma’s car window
While in Ma’s bedroom, Haley and Maggie are startled by a girl holding a scary mask over her face
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
A sound effect plays as Jeremiah becomes agitated when asking Marlene to fetch Brother Swan
As the lights flicker, the Black Skulls suddenly grab Red and Mandy from their beds
Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen

One of Susan’s employees shows her footage on her smart phone from a baby monitor. While looking at the phone, Susan suddenly sees a frightening image of Ray (the antagonist of the story she is reading) flash briefly on the screen
The little girl suddenly turns around with blood all over her
Because Sissy is lost in her thoughts, she hits a kangaroo with the car
Sissy stares at the creepy painting and therefore gets scared by Alex coming in
Alex grabs the phone and looks around as she discovers the dead body of Jamie in the grass
Sissy starts hitting herself with her phone
After removing a few towels from under the bed, Emma finds Tracey’s corpse
While Emma is trying to process what happened, Sissy appears in the door behind her
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
Scene cut to stuffed pig with snort sound
Mom walks away revealing a figure behind her (no sound
Door shuts
Bloody face appears with loud sound
Woman turns into a bloody face
Kid jumps out to scare the other kids
A teen hold a jar with a spider in it. The jar suddenly breaks
Door opens with Credence standing there accompanied by a loud sound effect
Dominic appears behind the girls and grabs them as they scream
An old woman appears from under the sheets
A man jumps out from behind a wall
Dark arms protrude from the mirror
A bang comes from the wardrobe
Tommy suddenly combusts
Possessed Lane shakes and makes a loud noise
A second bang comes from the wardrobe
A rat jumps out from behind a box
Possessed Lane turns and looks at Max
A hand touches Max’s shoulder
A demon grabs  Chris’s leg from under the toilet stall
A demon jumps towards the camera
A third bang comes from the wardrobe
Possessed Lane suddenly looks up
The dog suddenly barks as Robyn approaches the door
Robyn wipes the steam off the shower window to reveal Gordo standing behind. [Video]
A large window shatters suddenly
Simon is punched in the face by a masked man
Simon’s stereo suddenly turns on

movies.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer

jump_scares.spoiler: A loud orchestral note plays as Bob is getting tested at the hospital
There is a loud sound effect after Martin bites into his arm and rips off some skin
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
The scene jump cuts from Vicki practicing her gun shooting skills to a champagne bottle popping and the sorority girls screaming in excitement
Mrs. Slater’s scares Vicki and her boyfriend making out and uses her cane to slashes the waterbed
Stevie kicks a chain in the dark boiler room beneath the pool and startles herself
As Stevie steadies the swinging lightbulb a hand grab her neck and forces her against the wall
Diane frightens Jeanie in the garden looking for Mrs. Slater
The attic door in the ceiling opens and Morgan screams as the camera rushes towards her
As the Jack-in-the-Box stops spinning the killer runs Mrs. Slater’s cane through her back
Katey is started when she turns around in the attic after discovering a clown costume resembling the Jack-in-the-Box
Diane jumps when an object falls from the van’s dashboard
A hand and Mrs. Slater’s cane come in through the van’s sunroof and attack Diane
Discovering Liz dead in the van, Vicki turns around terrified to see a figure wielding Mrs. Slater’s cane
The murder in the clown mask opens his eyes, and the movie ends

movies.title: The Last House on the Left

jump_scares.spoiler: A truck crashes into the police car
A hand suddenly bangs on Mari’s car window
Francis surprises Emma while she is picking up some knives
There is a flash of lightning and Krug’s outline can be seen in the corner of the room
As Lizzie sits on a bed nursing her amputated arm, we get 3 short sharp flash backs to Lizzie screaming which may startle some sensitive viewers
Mark asks Emma if she is happy and then shoots himself in the head
While Emma explores the house she is startled by a picture of Bobby Ray in her photo developing room
Bobby Ray rips back the cover on the boat where he thinks Emma is hiding
As Emma tries to escape, Bobby Ray smashes the car window
Bobby Ray attempts to wrestle a weapon away from his brother, Jimmy, and accidentally slams his head into a coat rack hook on the wall
After breaking through the ice, Emma stabs Bobby Ray in the eye to release herself from his grip
